articles.title: Yoolax Announces a Milestone 2025 of Growth, Smart Innovation, and Customer Trust
articles.mainIdea: Yoolax Announces a Milestone 2025 of Growth, Smart Innovation, and Customer Trust
articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: Yoolax Announces a Milestone 2025 of Growth, Smart Innovation, and Customer Trust. Yoolax caps off 2025 with major strides in service, product development, and smart home technology.HongKong, Dec. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Yoolax, a leading brand in the motorized window treatment industry, today announced the close of a milestone year defined by rapid growth, customer-led product innovation, and deeper integration into the modern smart home. articles.title: MINISO Brings Christmas Cheer to Bangkok's Siam Square with YOYO and Signature Characters, Closing Out a Standout Year in Thailand
articles.mainIdea: MINISO Brings Christmas Cheer to Bangkok's Siam Square with YOYO and Signature Characters, Closing Out a Standout Year in Thailand
articles.summary: PR Newswire: MINISO Brings Christmas Cheer to Bangkok's Siam Square with YOYO and Signature Characters, Closing Out a Standout Year in Thailand. This Christmas, MINISO is bringing YOYO and a lineup of its popular characters to Bangkok's Siam Square, creating a festive seasonal setting and marking the close of a strong year for the brand in Thailand. A series of Christmas-themed installations will remain in place across Siam Square's pedestrian streets and at Thailand's first MINISO LAND through the holiday period, running until January 4, 2026. Related tickers mentioned: MNSO.
